title: Omfg, this is the fourth app, no joke
comment: Why is there no automatic income!? There should ALWAYS be an automatic expenses and automatic income option on ANY professional Expenses Manager. I get a salary deposit every 2 weeks and there is no option for this. Also, there are monthly expenses like cable, internet, cell phone and other finite expenses that is an EXTREME hassle re-entering every single time they come up. Worst and most unprofessional app out there for expenses. Please contact me when this has been added on. Searching for another app now
Automatic transactions are supported. Go to "Templates and plans", create a template, define a plan, and you are set up.

When i try to add several "0" digits i can't do it and it works as delete. Tried on my both phone and both were same. And i wish i could change the back up location on the device

Many thanks for the feedback. You can group expenses per month. Just call the command "Grouping" from the menu and select "Month". Please contact support@myexpenses.mobi with a description where you enter this "0" and we will certainly find a solution. You can configure the backup location in the settings.

Tap and hold (long press) on an entry, this opens the contextual action bar, where several commands related to the selected transactions are available. You can select multiple transactions and the command will be applied to all of them.

title: Still missing some basic features
comment: The app looks nice and fairly simple.  Promises to be a pocket companion. Allows qif export. I even got the premium key. However, it is not allowing transfer between accounts in different currencies, which is a deal breaker for me as it makes the app next to useless on trips abroad, which is one of the main reasons to carry an app like this around. As the features are being actively implemented, this functionality may be expected in the upcoming release.
Thank you for the feedback. Transfers between accounts in different currencies are on the roadmap for an upcoming version.

title: Why Does this app needs My device photo and media access?
comment: Why Does this app needs My device photo and media access?
This permission is needed for storing exports and backups on the SD card.

title: Why this app need media: photo and calendar access
comment: Why this app need media: photo and calendar access
Media access is needed for storing exports and backups on the SD card. The calendar access is used for storing the plans for recurring transactions.

title: Works great.
comment: I like it because if its simplistic and visually clear layout with easy to read and quickly check what is going on.  Adding transactions, funds, transfering are all done very quick and easy.  I would like to ask the devs if the below are in the workings or included and i mightve not seen them.  1)is there a view where i can group daily average or weekly or montlhy total expenditure? Or by account? That would be awsome! 2) can you make a budget plan? , if yes then id purchase it!

Many thanks for the feedback: Grouping is supported, select the command "Grouping" from the menu, and it will display the totals for a group. This can be done for one account, but also for the aggregate of all accounts that share the same currency. Averages are not yet calculated.
Budget plans are on the road-map for a future version.

comment: Good job devs, great app! but how do I change the default currency from USD to PH Peso?
Thank you for the feedback. Open the navigation drawer (clicking on the icon in left upper corner), where you find the account list. Click on the edit icon, and you can change the currency.

title: Great app. It's a keeper.
comment: I've been searching for a while and finally gave this app a try. Liked so much, I upgraded. The only thing that I have a question about is the two black icons "transaction and transfer'. If I hit either, they tell me "application not installed ".  I thought they would be useful shortcuts, although the transfer won't work any way because for now, I'm just using one account. Please lead me in the right direction,  as I'm sure it's user error.  But I have not un-installed anything on my Galaxy TabPro 12.2.  Rating goes to five stars if this can work (at least the transaction one). Thanks for the great app!  UPDATE 10/10 Two updates ago the new transaction icon was working and it made the app much better. Then with the last update, it "worked" but did not enter the transaction into the main app. Not good.

Thanks for the feedback. This is a known problem on Samsung devices. See https://plus.google.com/+MyexpensesMobi/posts/CUF4HE2pVVy for a workaround.
We have not been able to reproduce the problem of the transaction not being entered into the main app. Would you mind contacting support@myexpenses.mobi, and we search for the root of the problem?

title: Just what I needed
comment: This app seems to do everything I need being able to import my Quicken without any trouble at all. I have not tested the export yet but probably it will work just fine . One minor glitch, and that is in the category list. The list is in case sensitive alphabetical order.  This means that every category that begins with a capital letter will come before any category that begins with a small case letter. Thus "Garbage" will be in the list where you would expect but "goodies" follows "Zebra."
Many thanks for the feedback. This will be fixed in next version.

Danke für das Feedback. Kontensortierung wird in einer der nächsten Versionen unterstützt. Wiederkehrende Buchungen werden über "Vorlagen und Pläne" erfasst. Neue Vorlage anlegen, dann auf "Plan erstellen" klicken. Dadurch wird ein Ereignis im Kalender angelegt, über den die Frequenz definiert werden kann.

A future version will provide the option to define limits where the app will display warnings https://github.com/mtotschnig/MyExpenses/issues/139

title: How do you add income?
comment: Easy to set up, but can't for the life of me add income.

title: Pretty Good
comment: I just changed to Android from iPhone and have been looking for an app comparable to Checkbook hd for the iPhone. This one so far is the best I've  found. Takes a minute to figure it out but the tips are helpful. Would like to see a few changes. I would like to see the section that shows all the accounts & their balances as the default main page. Other major change I would like to see is do a month by month view for the accounts instead of one long list of transactions for each account.

Thanks! The account list is available from the "navigation drawer", which is the Android way of providing main navigation options, it is accessible through one single tap, we think a separate screen is not needed. Do you know that you can group your transactions per month? Please contact support@myexpenses.mobi to discuss your suggestions.

title: Split transactions
comment: Very practical and well designed.  Would be nice to be able to split one transaction  to multiple categories.
Thank you! Split transactions are available since version 1.8.5.

title: Semplice ma efficace
comment: Applicazione molto utile e semplice per gestire le proprie finanze e spese. E con il tema Holo è molto più gradevole esteticamente. Aggiornamenti continui e un ottimo supporto.

comment: Applicazione ben fatta e comodissima per gestire le proprie finanze. Ottima la possibilità di esportare i dati in un foglio di calcolo csv

title: Templates
